Dated :   4.12.2006 
 
 
Circular No. 25/ 2006 
 
Subject:- 
Security controls for  catering  supplies.   
 
 
In order to  ensure  appropriate security controls for   catering  supplies  
intended  for carriage  on passenger flights, the  following instructions  shall be  
strictly implemented  by  all concerned  with immediate  effect:- 
 
(i) 
Adequate security control measures shall be  implemented at catering 
facilities as per the BCAS approved  security programme  and  instructions  
issued  by the  BCAS  vide  AVSEC  Order  7/2004. 
 
(ii) 
Catering premises shall be  adequately protected to prevent unauthorized 
access. 
 
(iii) 
Catering operators  shall procure and apply tamper-proof security seals for 
their catering carts and vehicles. 
 
(iv) 
Authorized and trained personnel shall be deployed for  performing 
catering security controls. 
 
(v) 
Security arrangements at the catering establishments shall be monitored 
regularly by the  BCAS  officers to ensue  that the instructions  issued  by the  
BCAS are  strictly  implemented and  security procedures established  as per the  
approved security programme are adhered to by the caterers. 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of  Security (CA)
